summary: A housewife suspects that her seemingly perfect eight-year-old daughter is a heartless killer.
cast: Gage Clarke|Jesse White|Joan Croydon|William Hopper|Paul Fix|Henry Jones|Evelyn Varden|Eileen Heckart|Patty McCormack|Nancy Kelly|Frank Cady|Frances Bavier|Violet N. Cane|Vivian Clermont|Shelley Fabares|Kathy Garver|Don C. Harvey|Edna Holland|Dayton Lummis|Natalie Masters|Patricia Morrow|Adele Taylor|John Truax
title: La mala semilla
